name: stikir (itch)
description:
This game is about making this game.

o Weird boss fights.

o There are some platformer levels.

o You push left, right, jump and sometimes press X.

o It can be frustrating sometimes.


Trailer


Reviews

“Stikir is wonderful and frustrating and fun and strange, all in one small package.” GameSpew

“A quirky adventure backs up its random humour with solid gameplay and great pacing.” Only Single Player

“A short and abstract platformer with a colour palette that recalls the glorious EGA days.” PC Gamer
